t: Alderac Entertainment Group - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG) is a publisher of family board game products. AEG was formed by Jolly Blackburn in 1993. Blackburn left the company in 1995 and the majority of the company is now owned by President & CEO John Zinser.

t: Alderac Entertainment Group | Board Game Publisher | BoardGameGeek
s: Alderac Entertainment Group, or AEG, is a family-owned publisher of tabletop family games. AEG was formed in the early 1990s and has been continuously owned and operated by President & CEO John Zinser. History: AEG began as a publisher of a general interest tabletop gaming magazine named Shadis.
